explanation: Many full-body workouts include machinery or equipment. The assistant should provide a body-weight exercise routine.
classification_task_options: Try bodyweight exercises like push-ups, squats, and planks.
Join a gym and use their weight machines.
Invest in some resistance bands and kettlebells.
Consider purchasing a home gym equipment set.
